instruction: Neighbour waste en veettu pakkam podugiraar - action enna?
output: Corporation/Municipality complaint: Solid Waste Management Rules violation. Police: IPC 268 (public nuisance), 269 (negligent act spreading disease). Photos/videos evidence. Tahsildar complaint-um possible. Fine up to Rs.5,000 for waste dumping violation.

instruction: Health insurance cashless reject aanaal reimbursement kidaikkumaa?
output: Aama. Cashless rejection ≠ claim rejection. Pay hospital, submit bills to insurer. Reimbursement claim: 15-30 days. Rejection-kku: IRDAI complaint, Ombudsman, Consumer forum. Pre-authorization issues: TPA (Third Party Administrator) contact. Network hospital outside-um claim possible.

instruction: Building demolish panra maadiri solraanga, poganuuma?
output: Demolition notice vandhaal: 1) Genuine notice-aa verify pannunga (municipal records), 2) Owner alternative accommodation or compensation taranum, 3) Reasonable notice period (usually 6 months), 4) Fake notice = harassment case podalam. Rights: Relocation assistance, advance rent return, shifting cost compensation. Don't vacate without proper documentation.

instruction: Salary தர மாட்டேங்குறாங்க, 3 months pending - என்ன செய்வது?
output: Options: 1) Written demand to employer, 2) Labour Inspector complaint, 3) Labour Court (if >Rs.15,000 dispute), 4) Civil Court recovery suit. Payment of Wages Act: Salary delay = interest + penalty. Documents: Appointment letter, salary slips, bank statements.

instruction: Spam calls/SMS stop பண்ண என்ன செய்யணும்?
output: DND registration: 1909 call/SMS அல்லது TRAI DND app. Complaint: 1909-ல் spam report. DND-க்குப் பிறகும் spam வந்தால் company-க்கு Rs.1,000/violation fine. Truecaller-type apps-ல் report. Bank/company opt-out options use பண்ணுங்க.

instruction: Telecom/Mobile company bill dispute - எங்கே complaint செய்வது?
output: Steps: 1) Company customer care (written complaint), 2) Appellate Authority (company website-ல் details இருக்கும்), 3) TRAI (trai.gov.in) complaint, 4) Consumer forum. Wrong billing, service failure, unauthorized charges எல்லாத்துக்கும் complaint போடலாம்.

instruction: Bail bond amount எவ்வளவு இருக்கும்?
output: Offence severity based - Rs.10,000 to lakhs வரை. Court discretion. Surety (guarantor) same amount-க்கு guarantee கொடுக்கணும். Poor accused-க்கு personal bond (surety இல்லாம) கிடைக்கும். Excessive bail unconstitutional.

instruction: GPA (General Power of Attorney) moolam property sale valid-aa?
output: Supreme Court ruling (2011): GPA moolam property sale NOT valid. GPA holder sale deed execute pannalam, but final ownership transfer Principal neril vandhu sign seyyanum or properly registered Special Power of Attorney venum.

instruction: Shop employee rights என்ன?
output: TN Shops and Establishments Act: 1) 8 hours work/day, 48 hours/week, 2) Weekly off mandatory, 3) Leave: 12 days earned + 12 days sick + 5 casual, 4) Overtime double wages, 5) No child labour (<14 years). Violation: Labour Inspector complaint.

instruction: e-Sevai services எங்கே available?
output: Locations: Taluk offices, e-Sevai centres, Common Service Centres. Online: eservices.tn.gov.in. Services: Certificates (income, community, nativity), Patta transfer, Pension, Ration card, License renewals. Fee: Rs.30-100 (service based).

instruction: Workplace-ல் sexual harassment, POSH Act என்ன சொல்லுது?
output: POSH Act 2013 (Prevention of Sexual Harassment): 1) Every office with 10+ employees - Internal Committee (IC) இருக்கணும், 2) Complaint: IC-க்கு 3 months-க்குள், 3) Inquiry: 90 days-க்குள் complete, 4) Action: Transfer, warning, termination. No IC: Local Committee-க்கு complaint. Retaliation protection உண்டு. Anonymous complaint-உம் valid.

instruction: Divorce-ல் wife-க்கு என்ன rights இருக்கு?
output: Rights: 1) Maintenance (permanent alimony), 2) Streedhan (gifts given at marriage), 3) Share in husband's property (if jointly acquired), 4) Child custody preference (especially below 5 years), 5) Residence right till divorce. Interim maintenance during case நடக்கும்போதே கிடைக்கும்.

instruction: Will contest பண்ணலாமா?
output: ஆம். Grounds: Undue influence, fraud, forgery, unsound mind, improper execution. Contest: Probate Court. Time: Before probate granted-க்கு எதிர்ப்பு, after = revocation suit. Evidence: Medical records, witnesses, handwriting expert. Burden of proof: Contestant.

instruction: Rent Authority-la complaint eppadi koduppadhu?
output: District Collectorate office-la written application kodukkanum. Required documents: 1) Rental agreement copy, 2) Rent receipts, 3) Communication proof (notices, messages), 4) ID proof. Online-lum e-district portal moolam apply seyyalam. Fee: Nominal (Rs.100-500).

instruction: TNEB electricity complaint எப்படி போடுவது?
output: Options: 1) TANGEDCO helpline: 1912, 2) Online: tangedco.gov.in, 3) TNEB app, 4) Local section office. Issues: Billing errors, connection delay, power cut, meter fault. Escalation: AE → EE → SE → CE. Consumer Grievance Redressal Forum (CGRF) for unresolved issues.

instruction: Live-in relationship legal-aa?
output: Aama, adult consenting partners-kku legal. Supreme Court recognized. DV Act protection apply aagum. Aanaal marriage benefits (inheritance, maintenance as spouse) automatic illa. Long-term live-in partners-kku certain rights undu.

instruction: Divorce-kku ennenna grounds irukku?
output: Hindu Marriage Act grounds: 1) Adultery, 2) Cruelty (physical/mental), 3) Desertion (2+ years), 4) Conversion to another religion, 5) Unsound mind, 6) Venereal disease, 7) Renunciation (sanyasa), 8) Not heard alive for 7 years. Wife additional ground: Husband has another wife.

instruction: Minimum wages Tamil Nadu-la evvalavu?
output: Varies by industry and skill level. Unskilled: Rs.410-450/day, Semi-skilled: Rs.430-500/day, Skilled: Rs.480-600/day (approximate, 2024). Labour Department website-la exact rates. Less koduthal Labour Inspector-kku complaint.

instruction: Fake product விற்ற e-commerce site-க்கு case போடலாமா?
output: ஆம். Counterfeit/fake products விற்பது illegal. Consumer forum-ல் compensation claim செய்யலாம். Trademark owner-க்கும் report பண்ணலாம். Police complaint (IPC 420 - cheating) போடலாம். E-commerce platform-உம் liable.

instruction: Medical negligence case-kku enna evidence venum?
output: Required: 1) All medical records (hospital bound to give), 2) Prescriptions, 3) Test reports, 4) Bills, 5) Expert medical opinion (another doctor's opinion), 6) Death certificate (if applicable). RTI moolam government hospital records peralaam.

instruction: Medicine MRP-க்கு மேல் விற்றால் complaint எங்கே?
output: Complaint: Drug Inspector (District), State Drug Control. Legal Metrology Department-உம் complaint எடுக்கும். Pharmacy license suspend/cancel ஆகலாம். Consumer forum-ல் compensation. Evidence: Bill with MRP comparison. Toll-free: 1800-11-4000.

instruction: Insurance claim reject aanaal enna seivathu?
output: Steps: 1) Rejection reason written-aa kelunga, 2) Insurance company grievance cell, 3) Insurance Ombudsman (igms.irda.gov.in), 4) Consumer forum, 5) MACT (accident claims). Common rejection reasons: Policy lapse, drunk driving, unlicensed driver. Documentation mukkiyam.

instruction: Vehicle insurance types ennenna?
output: Types: 1) Third-party (mandatory) - others-kku damage cover, 2) Comprehensive - own vehicle + third party, 3) Own damage - only own vehicle. Third-party minimum kattaayam (MV Act). Without insurance driving: Rs.2,000 fine + vehicle seizure.
